original_title: This Side of the Truth, A Truly 'Honest' Making of The Invention of Lying
overview: The cast share their thoughts on Gervais, his laugh, and the art of "corpsing," when Gervais can't keep a scene together before laughing. A longer reel of corpsing and outtakes follows
title: This Side of the Truth, A Truly 'Honest' Making of The Invention of Lying
